cast.overview: An aspiring musician agrees to a marriage of convenience with a soon-to-deploy Marine, but a tragedy soon turns their fake relationship all too real.
cast.title: Purple Hearts

details.biography:
Leroy Edwards III hails from Washington, D.C., and is a Howard University graduate.

He is known for “Purple Hearts,” "Monster: The Jeffrey Dahmer Story," "The Killer, “ "Operation Varsity Blues," "A House Divided," "Young and the Restless," “General Hospital” and the hit Crackle network series "Sequestered."

Leroy is so committed to a rigorous health and fitness lifestyle that it allows him to do all of his own stunts like the calisthenics and running routine necessary to effectively portray Dr. Kazigo in "Blood Relatives."

In order to do any athletic or physically challenging acting roles, Leroy swims a mile daily, runs three miles 4 times a week; and trains with free weights. He is also a third-degree black belt in Tae Kwon Do, plays several instruments; and is proficient in American Sign Language.

(2022) Filming in Studio City, CA.

Written by Hopkins + Co.
details.name: Leroy Edwards III
